verses.text: \w For|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* choirmaster, \w to|strong="H1732"\w* \w be|strong="H1732"\w* accompanied \w by|strong="H1732"\w* flutes. \w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w Psalm|strong="H4210"\w* \w of|strong="H4210"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. Give ear \w to|strong="H1732"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* words, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*; consider \w my|strong="H1732"\w* groaning.

Attend \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* sound \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* cry, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* King \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* You \w I|strong="H3068"\w* pray.

\w In|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* morning, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w hear|strong="H7181"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*; \w at|strong="H4428"\w* daybreak \w I|strong="H3588"\w* lay \w my|strong="H3588"\w* plea before \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* wait \w in|strong="H4428"\w* expectation.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H6963"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H8085"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* delights \w in|strong="H3068"\w* wickedness; no evil can dwell \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H6963"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* boastful \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w stand|strong="H1481"\w* \w in|strong="H1481"\w* \w Your|strong="H3588"\w* presence; \w You|strong="H3588"\w* hate all workers \w of|strong="H7451"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H7562"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w destroy|strong="H3605"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w tell|strong="H3605"\w* lies; \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* abhors \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* bloodshed \w and|strong="H5869"\w* deceit.

\w But|strong="H1696"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* enter \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* house \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* abundance \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* loving devotion; \w in|strong="H3068"\w* reverence \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* bow down \w toward|strong="H3068"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* holy temple.

Lead \w me|strong="H1004"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w Your|strong="H1004"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H2617"\w* \w because|strong="H7230"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H7230"\w* enemies; make straight \w Your|strong="H1004"\w* way before \w me|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w For|strong="H6440"\w* \w not|strong="H1870"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* word \w they|strong="H3068"\w* speak can \w be|strong="H3068"\w* trusted; destruction lies \w within|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*. \w Their|strong="H3068"\w* throats \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w open|strong="H6440"\w* graves; \w their|strong="H3068"\w* tongues \w practice|strong="H1870"\w* deceit.

Declare \w them|strong="H3588"\w* guilty, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God; let \w them|strong="H3588"\w* fall \w by|strong="H3559"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* own devices. Drive \w them|strong="H3588"\w* \w out|strong="H2505"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* many transgressions, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* rebelled \w against|strong="H3956"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* let \w all|strong="H7230"\w* \w who|strong="H3588"\w* take refuge \w in|strong="H5307"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* rejoice; let \w them|strong="H5307"\w* ever shout \w for|strong="H3588"\w* joy. \w May|strong="H5307"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* shelter \w them|strong="H5307"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3588"\w* love \w Your|strong="H3588"\w* name \w may|strong="H5307"\w* rejoice \w in|strong="H5307"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* surely \w You|strong="H3605"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, bless \w the|strong="H3605"\w* righteous; \w You|strong="H3605"\w* surround \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* shield \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w Your|strong="H3605"\w* favor.
